API Reference

Scraper

GradCafe scraper.

Iterates over sequential result IDs, fetches HTML pages, filters placeholder entries, and yields minimal raw records (HTML + URL + date_added).

M2_material.scrape.get_last_attempted_id()
M2_material.scrape.get_last_stop_reason()
M2_material.scrape.get_latest_survey_id() → int | None

Fetch the GradCafe survey page and return the highest result ID found. Returns None if the page can’t be fetched or parsed.

M2_material.scrape.scrape_data(start_entry: int, end_entry: int | None = None, stop_on_placeholder_streak: bool = True, placeholder_limit: int = 10, max_failures: int = 50, max_seconds: int | None = None)

Generator that yields cleaned scrape payloads: {“url”: <url>, “html”: <html content>, “date_added”: <added on>}

Cleaner

GradCafe HTML cleaner.

This module takes raw HTML pages from the scraper and converts them into a consistent dict shape used by the database loader. It focuses on extracting: - core program/university fields - applicant status/decision dates - term/year, citizenship, GRE/GPA - sanitized comments/notes

M2_material.clean.clean_data(raw_pages)

Converts raw GradCafe HTML into structured applicant data. Sanitizes notes/comments to remove emojis/unwanted Unicode characters.

M2_material.clean.load_data(filename='applicant_data.json')

Utility helper to load cleaned data back into memory.

M2_material.clean.save_data(data, filename='applicant_data.json')

Utility helper to persist cleaned data for debugging.

Load Data

Load a JSON/JSONL file into the applicants table (smaller batches).

db.load_data.create_table() → None
db.load_data.insert_records(conn, records: list[dict]) → None
db.load_data.main(path='/Users/mckeysa1/Github-Setup/jhu_software_concepts/assignment_4/Module_4/src/M3_material/data/extra_llm_applicant_data.json') → None

Query Data

SQL query helpers for Module 3 analytics.

Each function opens a DB connection, runs a focused SQL query, and returns simple numeric results used by the dashboard and PDF report.

M3_material.query_data.acceptance_rate_fall_2026(use_term_filter: bool)

Acceptance rate for the selected cohort.

M3_material.query_data.additional_question_1(use_term_filter: bool)

Percent of applicants who reported a GPA.

M3_material.query_data.additional_question_2(use_term_filter: bool)

Average GRE Quant for international applicants.

M3_material.query_data.average_metrics_all_applicants(use_term_filter: bool)

Average GPA/GRE metrics for the selected cohort.

M3_material.query_data.avg_gpa_acceptances_fall_2026(use_term_filter: bool)

Average GPA among accepted applicants in the selected cohort.

M3_material.query_data.avg_gpa_american_fall_2026(use_term_filter: bool)

Average GPA for American applicants in the selected cohort.

M3_material.query_data.build_analysis_results()

Return the analysis dict used by the Module 3 dashboard.

M3_material.query_data.count_fall_2026_entries(use_term_filter: bool)

Count entries in the 2026 cohort (or all entries if filter disabled).

M3_material.query_data.count_jhu_masters_cs(use_term_filter: bool)

Count JHU MS in CS applicants using LLM + raw text edge cases.

M3_material.query_data.count_top_phd_acceptances_2026_llm(use_term_filter: bool)

Count accepted PhD CS applicants using LLM-normalized universities.

M3_material.query_data.count_top_phd_acceptances_2026_raw_university(use_term_filter: bool)

Count accepted PhD CS applicants by raw university names in program.

M3_material.query_data.count_total_applicants()

Total records in applicants table.

M3_material.query_data.get_connection()

Open a DB connection or raise a helpful error.

M3_material.query_data.get_latest_db_id()

Return the highest GradCafe result ID stored in the database.

M3_material.query_data.percent_international_students(use_term_filter: bool)

Percent international (not American/Other) in the selected cohort.

Flask Routes

Flask routes for Module 3 pages.

Responsibilities: - Render the analysis dashboard and PDF link. - Start/track/cancel the pull-data subprocess. - Expose a small JSON status endpoint for the UI timer and LLM readiness.

M3_material.board.pages.analysis_page()

Alias for the Module 3 analysis dashboard.

M3_material.board.pages.cancel_pull()
M3_material.board.pages.module_3_project()

Render the Module 3 dashboard with current analysis results.

M3_material.board.pages.pull_data()

Trigger a background pull if LLM is ready and no pull is running.

M3_material.board.pages.pull_data_api()

JSON endpoint for triggering a pull.

M3_material.board.pages.pull_status()

Return JSON status for UI polling (LLM ready + progress).

M3_material.board.pages.update_analysis()

Recompute analysis and regenerate the PDF report.

M3_material.board.pages.update_analysis_api()

JSON endpoint to recompute analysis.
